attributes.action: review Government funding for research into Honey Bee pests and diseases and integrated pest management programmes.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the light of Colony Collapse Disorder and other potential threats,I urge the Government to increase the funding for Bee Research.Honey Bees play a vital role in pollination and are vital to food production and the  country's economy.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "review Government funding for research into Honey Bee pests and diseases and integrated pest management programmes."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here:
